text: Hamcunon, ki ne'mathojamonro ʙa sumo arzoni namudem, (ja'ne, ruj ʙa coniʙi Ka'ʙa kardan) niz dar mijoni sumo pajomʙare az qavmi sumo firistodem, to ojathoi Moro ʙarojaton ʙixonad va sumoro az sirk va ʙadaxloqi pokiza gardonad va kitoʙu hikmat va ahkomi sar'iat ʙijomuzad va az axʙor va qissahoi pajomʙaroni guzasta on ciro, ki namedonisted, ʙa sumo jod dihad
